name: Final Islands
description:
Final Islands is a Top-down view Action Roguelike.

2 most important thing are Action and Build.

-- Action
With unique physic system you need to "manually" control your character, an action Diablo like game.

-- Build
More than 150 attributes, items, skills, runes and classes. Combine these together to build your own style.

-- Challenge
Not only prepare before the game start but also you need to collect things during the game, get used to your character, make decision in a very short time while surrounding by numerous monsters.
